import React, { useState } from "react"; const SemesterDisplay = () => { // Mock data for semesters const [semesters, setSemesters] = useState([ { id: 1, name: "Fall 2023", startDate: "2023-09-01", endDate: "2023-12-15", status: "Completed", courses: 8, students: 120, }, { id: 2, name: "Spring 2024", startDate: "2024-01-15", endDate: "2024-05-10", status: "Active", courses: 10, students: 145, }, { id: 3, name: "Summer 2024", startDate: "2024-06-01", endDate: "2024-08-15", status: "Upcoming", courses: 6, students: 85, }, { id: 4, name: "Fall 2024", startDate: "2024-09-01", endDate: "2024-12-15", status: "Upcoming", courses: 9, students: 0, }, ]); return (
